mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.dispatch_no AS "dispatchNo", a.dispatch_status AS "dispatchStatus", a.dispatch_time AS "dispatchTime", a.dispatch_type AS "dispatchType", a.departure_time AS "departureTime", a.is_exception AS "isException", a.is_app_input AS "isAppInput", a.transport_type AS "transportType", a.total_qty AS "totalQty", a.received_qty AS "receivedQty", a.total_weight AS "totalWeight", a.total_cubic AS "totalCubic", a.total_amount AS "totalAmount", a.dispatch_outlet_code AS "dispatchOutletCode", a.dispatcher AS "dispatcher", a.carrier_code AS "carrierCode", a.car_no AS "carNo", a.driver AS "driver", a.driver_tel AS "driverTel", a.start_area_id AS "startAreaId", a.end_area_id AS "endAreaId", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.account AS "account", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.base_org_id AS "baseOrgId", a.copilot AS "copilot", a.dispatch_plan_no AS "dispatchPlanNo", a.data_source AS "dataSource", a.total_sku_qty AS "totalSkuQty", a.cash_amount AS "cashAmount", a.prepaid_amount AS "prepaidAmount", a.trip AS "trip", a.shift AS "shift", a.platform AS "platform", a.seal_no AS "sealNo", a.feed_back_status AS "feedBackStatus"

a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.label_no AS "labelNo", a.dispatch_no AS "dispatchNo", a.transport_no AS "transportNo", a.customer_no AS "customerNo", a.receive_ship AS "receiveShip", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.base_org_id AS "baseOrgId", a.dispatch_site_outlet_code AS "dispatchSiteOutletCode", a.status AS "status", a.cabin AS "cabin", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.qty AS "qty", a.weight AS "weight", a.cubic AS "cubic", a.store_dispatch_no AS "storeDispatchNo", a.def1 AS "def1", a.def2 AS "def2", a.def3 AS "def3", a.def4 AS "def4", a.def5 AS "def5", a.def6 AS "def6", a.def7 AS "def7", a.def8 AS "def8", a.def9 AS "def9", a.def10 AS "def10"

a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.dispatch_no AS "dispatchNo", a.dispatch_seq AS "dispatchSeq", a.outlet_code AS "outletCode", a.receive_ship AS "receiveShip", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.base_org_id AS "baseOrgId"
mapper.select:
SELECT t.transport_obj_name AS "dispatchOutletName", tto.transport_obj_name AS "carrierName", td.name AS "driverName", so.name AS "orgName", tdc.name AS "copilotName", sas.name AS "startAreaName", sae.name AS "endAreaName",
FROM tm_dispatch_order_header a LEFT JOIN tm_transport_obj t on a.dispatch_outlet_code = t.transport_obj_code AND a.base_org_id = t.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_transport_obj tto on a.carrier_code = tto.transport_obj_code AND a.base_org_id = tto.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_driver td on a.driver = td.code AND a.base_org_id = td.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_driver tdc on tdc.code = a.copilot and tdc.org_id = a.base_org_id LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_area sas ON a.start_area_id = sas.id LEFT JOIN sys_area sae ON a.end_area_id = sae.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT tdol.dispatch_no AS "dispatchNo", tdol.transport_no AS "transportNo", tdol.customer_no AS "customerNo", tdol.label_no AS "labelNo", tdol.receive_ship AS "receiveShip", ttoh.principal_code AS "principalCode", ttop.transport_obj_name AS "principalName", tdol.owner_code AS "customerCode", ttoo.transport_obj_name AS "customerName", tdol.sku_code AS "skuCode", ti.sku_name AS "skuName", tdol.dispatch_site_outlet_code AS "dispatchSiteOutletCode", ttoh.ship_city_id AS "nowCityId", ttoh.consignee_city_id AS "nextCityId", tdol.base_org_id AS "baseOrgId", tdol.org_id AS "orgId", tdol.cabin AS "cabin", tdol.qty AS "qty", tdol.weight AS "weight", tdol.cubic AS "cubic", ttoh.order_type AS "orderType" FROM tm_dispatch_order_label tdol LEFT JOIN tm_transport_order_header ttoh ON tdol.transport_no = ttoh.transport_no AND tdol.base_org_id = ttoh.base_org_id LEFT JOIN tm_transport_obj ttoo ON tdol.owner_code = ttoo.transport_obj_code AND tdol.base_org_id = ttoo.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_transport_obj ttop ON ttoh.principal_code = ttop.transport_obj_code AND ttoh.base_org_id = ttop.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_item ti ON tdol.owner_code = ti.owner_code AND tdol.sku_code = ti.sku_code AND tdol.base_org_id = ti.org_id WHERE tdol.dispatch_no = #{dispatchNo} AND tdol.dispatch_site_outlet_code = #{dispatchSiteOutletCode} AND tdol.org_id = #{orgId}

select distinct tdoh.dispatch_no AS "dispatchNo", tdoh.dispatch_status AS "dispatchStatus", tdoh.car_no AS "vehicleNo", tv.transport_equipment_type_code AS "equipmentNo", ttet.supplier_code AS "gpsManufacturer", tdoh.dispatch_time AS "dispatchTime", tdoh.update_date AS "lastTravelTime" from tm_dispatch_order_label a inner join tm_dispatch_order_header tdoh on a.dispatch_no = tdoh.dispatch_no and a.org_id = tdoh.org_id inner join tm_vehicle tv on tdoh.car_no = tv.car_no and tdoh.base_org_id = tv.org_id inner join tm_transport_equipment_type ttet ON tv.transport_equipment_type_code = ttet.transport_equipment_type_code AND tv.org_id = ttet.org_id AND ttet.supplier_code IS NOT NULL
tdoh.dispatch_status >= '20' and a.transport_no = #{transportNo} and a.base_org_id = #{baseOrgId} and a.org_id = #{orgId}

SELECT tdoh.car_no as vehicleNo, td.name as driverName, tdoh.driver_tel as driverTel, MAX(IF(tdad.id is null, tdoh.departure_time, tdad.acquire_time)) as startTime, MAX(IF(thoh.status = '20', thoh.update_date, NOW())) as endTime, tv.transport_equipment_type_code as gpsNo, ttet.supplier_code as gpsManufacturer, tv.alarm_temp - IFNULL(tv.threshold_temp, 0) as warningTempFm, tv.alarm_temp + IFNULL(tv.threshold_temp, 0) as warningTempTo, tdoh.base_org_id as baseOrgId, tdoh.org_id as orgId FROM tm_dispatch_order_header tdoh INNER JOIN tm_vehicle tv ON tdoh.car_no = tv.car_no AND tdoh.base_org_id = tv.org_id INNER JOIN tm_transport_equipment_type ttet ON tv.transport_equipment_type_code = ttet.transport_equipment_type_code AND tv.org_id = ttet.org_id AND ttet.supplier_code IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN tm_handover_order_header thoh ON tdoh.dispatch_no = thoh.dispatch_no AND tdoh.org_id = thoh.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_device_acquire_data tdad ON tdoh.car_no = tdad.vehicle_no AND tv.transport_equipment_type_code = tdad.gps_no AND tdoh.org_id = tdad.org_id AND tdad.acquire_time > tdoh.departure_time LEFT JOIN tm_driver td ON tdoh.driver = td.code AND tdoh.base_org_id = td.org_id WHERE tdoh.departure_time IS NOT NULL AND tdoh.dispatch_status >= '20' AND tdoh.departure_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY tdoh.car_no, tdoh.driver, tdoh.driver_tel, tdoh.base_org_id, tdoh.org_id

SELECT tdoh.car_no as vehicleNo, td.name as driverName, tdoh.driver_tel as driverTel, MAX(IF(tdad.id is null, tdoh.departure_time, tdad.acquire_time)) as startTime, MAX(IF(thoh.status = '20', thoh.update_date, NOW())) as endTime, tv.transport_equipment_type_code as gpsNo, tdoh.base_org_id as baseOrgId, tdoh.org_id as orgId FROM tm_dispatch_order_header tdoh INNER JOIN tm_vehicle tv ON tdoh.car_no = tv.car_no AND tdoh.base_org_id = tv.org_id INNER JOIN tm_handover_order_header thoh ON tdoh.dispatch_no = thoh.dispatch_no AND tdoh.org_id = thoh.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_device_acquire_data tdad ON tdoh.car_no = tdad.vehicle_no AND tv.transport_equipment_type_code = tdad.gps_no AND tdoh.org_id = tdad.org_id AND tdad.acquire_time > tdoh.departure_time LEFT JOIN tm_driver td ON tdoh.driver = td.code AND tdoh.base_org_id = td.org_id WHERE tdoh.departure_time IS NOT NULL AND tdoh.dispatch_status = '20' AND tdoh.org_id = #{orgId} GROUP BY tdoh.car_no, tdoh.driver, tdoh.driver_tel, tdoh.base_org_id, tdoh.org_id
